channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Cargo ship fire in Los Angeles nearly contained after shelter-in-place order lifted
item.description: A fire that broke out aboard a container ship docked at the Port of Los Angeles was nearly contained by Saturday afternoon.

item.title: Alaska Native villages have few options and little US help as climate change devours their land
Babies who drank ByHeart formula got sick months before botulism outbreak, parents say
